text: aap se fatwa pochte hai, aap keh dijiye ke Allah ta’ala (khud) tumhe kalaala26 ke baare mein fatwa deta hai, agar koyi shaqs mar jaaye jis ki aulaad na ho aur ek behan ho to us ke chohde hoye maal ka aadha hissa hai aur wo bhai us behan ka waaris hoga agar us ke aulaad na ho, pas agar behne do ho to unhe kul chohde hoye ka do tihaayi milega aur agar kayi shaqs us naate ke hai mardh bhi aur aurte bhi, to mardh ke liye hissa hai, misl do aurto ke, Allah ta’ala tumhaare liye bayaan farma raha hai, ke aisa na ho ke tum bahek jaao, aur Allah ta’ala har cheez se waaqif hai
